text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We're a few days into summer<n>camp, and I find that it's
totally silent<n>tonight as I go to get some water. The<n>whole
camp must be sleeping soundly<n>after training.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But as I walk through the eerily empty<n>lobby in search of a
drink, I feel a chill<n>run up my spine...
I... cuuurse... youuu...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha, just the reaction I was<n>hoping for. You scare
easily, huh,<n>Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Oh, don't look at me like that. I was<n>only playing. Forgive
me?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I couldn't get to sleep and was bored<n>out of my mind. That
is, until you came<n>along!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
No need to worry—I'm not nervous or<n>anything. But this
might be the perfect<n>opportunity.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Come for a walk with me? Let's<n>enjoy the night air.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Ah, what a wonderful evening. I<n>haven't had a night to
myself like this<n>since we got here.
choice_data_list: You didn't check out the festival or fireworks?
You didn't check out the festival or fireworks?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I may be a student, but my duties as<n>a dorm leader are
many. Some of my<n>darling ponies need lots of comforting<n>
to sleep in unfamiliar beds.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
But just for tonight, I'd like to forget<n>my responsibilities and
have you all to<n>myself.
choice_data_list: You're not joking again, are you?
You're not joking again, are you?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, I'm serious. There's<n>something I want to show you.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Say, let's race to the beach.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Surprised as I am, I follow after her<n>as fast as I can.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She really deserves her nickname,<n>the Black Meteor. Her
running is<n>elegant, yet powerful. There's not an<n>ounce of
hesitation in it.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And it's wrapped in a relentless<n>passion to race.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Pant... Pant...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
The sound of the rippling waves is so<n>comforting. This really
is a wonderful<n>night.
choice_data_list: What's going on with you, Fuji?
What's going on with you, Fuji?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
What do you think? I wanted you to<n>see the fruits of our
training here. I've<n>been having the time of life running<n>
these last few days.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: So? Did my running excite you?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Hehe...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I need to tell you something. It's<n>important.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I've been thinking ever since that<n>student got injured and
had to leave<n>the academy. She entrusted her<n>dream to me,
as you may recall.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Thinking of how I can carry on her<n>dream has confounded
me.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
But when we saw that play together, I<n>realized what I need
to do.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki, the greatest entertainer,<n>who brings joy to the
world... That's<n>who I want to become.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: But this dream of mine continues<n>beyond that.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Making people happy, healing their<n>woes—that's what I
want to do. And I<n>also want to carry on their dreams<n>when
they themselves can't.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: For that purpose, I cannot lose to<n>anyone!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to continue to<n>run—always—and win as many
races<n>as I can! And when I rise as a star...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to obtain every racer's<n>dream—proof of being the
greatest.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I will win the Triple Crown. Thatwill be the ultimate realization of mydream.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The Triple Crown is a title given to<n>runners who triumph in
the three most<n>prestigious races—the Satsuki Sho, the<n>
Japanese Derby, and the Kikuka Sho.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In the history of the Twinkle Series,<n>only a rare few have
ever achieved it.<n>It's truly the greatest honor every<n>racer
aspires to!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
That is what I swear to you tonight. I<n>need you to act as my
witness.
choice_data_list: As your trainer, I accept your vow.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: There. Now that it's in words, Imust make it come true. To fail tomeet your expectations would be mygreatest defeat!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
So I have to start training seriously,<n>and I need you to keep
me on my<n>path!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Afterwards, I watch as she practices<n>for a while, and I see a
new light of<n>passion burning in her eyes.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Phew... I want to keep going, but I'm<n>afraid it'll be light
soon.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Nevertheless, a great dream lies<n>before me. I feel I can
almost reach<n>out and snatch it from the very air.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: All I want to do is keep running.
choice_data_list: What can I do to help you achieve your dream?
What can I do to help you achieve your dream?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I'll ask you again, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Guide me on my path. Be my<n>number-one supporter, my<n>
partner—always stay by my side!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Then on my name as the greatestentertainer, I promise to bring youthe most joy of all.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: You'll have a front-row seat to my<n>marvelous miracle.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Our partnership feels like it's just<n>beginning. From here on
out, we're<n>going after the biggest dream our<n>hearts can
imagine.
